sn45.56:1.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn45.56:1.2: In the same way good friendship is the forerunner and precursor of the noble eightfold path for a mendicant.
sn45.56:1.3: A mendicant with good friends can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.56:1.4: And how does a mendicant with good friends develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.56:1.5: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.56:1.6: That’s how a mendicant with good friends develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
